docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Artificial intelligence applications Digital Accessibility : AI improves web and digital media accessibility for individuals with disabilities through features like automatic captioning, text-to-speech, and personalized interface adaptations. Cognitive Computing : AI is used in simulating human thought processes, enhancing decision-making, and creating systems that learn, reason, and interact naturally. Waste Management : AI assists in sorting recyclables, optimizing waste collection routes, and managing waste reduction strategies through predictive analytics. Space Weather Forecasting: AI helps predict solar flares, geomagnetic storms, and other space weather events that can impact Earth and space missions. Blockchain and Cryptocurrency : AI is applied in predicting cryptocurrency market trends, managing blockchain networks, and enhancing security in transactions. Architectural Design : AI aids in sustainable design, structural optimization, and simulating building environments for energy efficiency and occupant comfort. Artificial Creativity : AI explores the realm of creating art, music, literature, and designs autonomously or in collaboration with humans. Forensic Science : AI is used for crime scene reconstruction, forensic analysis, and enhancing the accuracy and speed of forensic investigations. Remote Sensing and Geospatial Analysis : AI assists in analyzing satellite imagery for land use, environmental monitoring, and urban planning. Augmented and Mixed Reality : AI enriches AR and MR experiences with interactive and context-aware elements, blending digital content with the real world seamlessly. Biotechnology : AI accelerates gene editing research, protein structure prediction, and bioprocessing optimization. Esports and Online Gaming : AI enhances player matchmaking, anti-cheat systems, and creates adaptive gaming experiences. Library and Information Science : AI helps in cataloging, information retrieval, and providing personalized research assistance. Podcasting and Audio Production : AI assists in audio editing, noise reduction, and content recommendation for listeners. Microbiology and Epidemiology : AI aids in pathogen detection, outbreak prediction, and understanding microbial interactions. Performance Arts and Theater : AI is used in stage design, enhancing performance through interactive elements, and audience engagement analysis. Optical Engineering and Photonics : AI assists in designing optical systems, enhancing imaging techniques, and processing complex optical data. Psycholinguistics : AI aids in understanding language acquisition, processing, and the relationship between language and thought. Civil Liberties and Privacy Protection : AI is increasingly a tool and a subject of study in balancing technological advancement with privacy rights and civil liberties. Personal Fitness and Wellness : AI personalizes fitness regimens, tracks health metrics, and provides guidance for nutrition and wellness.
docs.title: AI
